website_summaries.verdict: Tops our list for attractive looks, comfortable fit, and durable construction- Ray-Ban's most versatile men's style on the market.
pros: An updated, contemporary version of a classic style
Has scratch-resistant glass lenses and a comfortable fit
cons: They run small, but the price falls on the higher end of the price spectrum

customer_reviews.title: Best of the lot
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable authentic RayBan glasses you could order. This is my second purchase of these - - my last ones got left in a restaurant - - and I ordered these on a Wednesday night and they were on my doorstep on Thursday late morning. I use these because they don't distort, are comfortable, sturdy, and look great. I do prefer the slightly smaller lens as the larger can get a bit heavy, but either way, they look wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela J

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and classic cool style
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and classic cool style. The G15 lenses are exceptionally clear, do a good job at cutting glare, and are great for driving. If you are coming from a pair of New Wayfarers (as I was) you should note that 1) In the same eye size (49) the overall lens size of these is a bit bigger, primarily from the lenses being "taller" than the NW. Also these are a fair bit heavier and have a tendency to slide down your nose (though proper adjustment of the bridge pads and ear hooks will correct this. Overall these are excellent glasses and I've received multiple compliments on them since I started wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: AceCadet

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Contrary to some of the other reviews, the glasses I received are most definitely authentic. They are an excellent pair of sunglasses that have met and exceeded my expectations in the last couple of months. The adjustable nose pads were a great relief compared to the plastic glasses/sunglass frames I'm used to wearing. I have dark hair and olive skin, and the havana/tortoiseshell color with green lenses seems to be the best match for me. I would definitely recommend this pair to anyone looking for a nice pair of glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Nicole

customer_reviews.title: My second pair of ClubMasters
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of ClubMasters, the first ones i purchased from Nordstrom and were stolen from me while backpacking in Israel. These are the best glasses and fit everyone perfectly no matter face shape. personally i have to go with the smaller frame because i have a smaller face and the lager frame over powers my face. these are great and feel just as sturdy as the ones from Nordstrom for nearly x2 the price. I'm a guy but have seen my girl friends try mine on and they look great and sexy! i would defiantly buy these if i was you. hopefully i don't lose these too lol!
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel Davies

customer_reviews.title: Difference between online and brick and mortar
customer_reviews.text: Wish there had been a better description of the different sizes or a how to size. They fit but seem a little small. Glasses came as promised and in good condition. Would prefer to make the purchase in brick and mortar location but no one local sells Ray-Ban I had to buy online which always leaves a disconnect between consumer and product. No bad vibe towards seller but would have possibly chosen the larger mm size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my Ray-Bans!
customer_reviews.text: These shades are a bit heavier on the face than most, but there is a solid substansiveness to them; they also tend to slid forward so they can sppear to perch on the bridge of one's nose. (They never slid off enturely@, however.) Once you get used to them, they unquestionably have a classic elegance to them that makes them, at least to me, very attractive. Think of JFK rocking on a sail boat off Hyannisport more than 50 years ago!
customer_reviews.author: PhilEBoy@AOL.com

customer_reviews.title: great price, fast shipping and very hassle free return ...
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning as my needs changed. It was a greta looking product and even Made in Italy. I've seen ones shipped by buying from the Ray-Ban website that were made in China. Definitely authentic, great price, fast shipping and very hassle free return process which wasn;t the product's fault. While didn't end up keep I would definitely recommend and would consider for the future
customer_reviews.author: BT

customer_reviews.title: Genuine, high quality Ray-Bans
customer_reviews.text: These looked so much better than I expected! They look and feel like great quality sunglasses.The lenses are not as green as I expected from the pictures, they're pretty dark green/black. Otherwise, exactly as depicted. Also, if you look on Ray-Bans website, the clubmaster model is made in both Italy and China. So if you get a pair from China, they aren't necessarily a knock-off or imitation. The pair I received are absolutely genuine Ray-Bans-made in China. They came with the signature Ray-Ban box with model number along with a black and gold Ray-Ban case. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Scanlan

customer_reviews.title: these sunglasses offer the same quality I love and expect from the company
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of Ray Ban, these sunglasses offer the same quality I love and expect from the company. I needed the small frames and they fit and look great. They are not as light weight as wafers or aviators, but they aren't as heavy as some glasses I have had. I've had them for less than 24 hours and have been complimented numerous times on them. These are trend setter glasses. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Authentic Ray Bans, same as in store at Sunglass Hut for a fraction of the price. When I ordered these I was worried the lenses might be too light, but they are actually pretty dark and I love the classic clubmaster look. If you are looking for this type of Sunglass, I highly recommend going in store to confirm your preference and then ordering as there are many similar but slightly different models. I did this and couldn't be happier with the tortoise frames I chose.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Dope.
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciate a nice comfortable pair of sunglasses. I bought these from a store located near me and ended up sitting on them one day when I was in a rush. I looked up the product number (located on the inside of the sunglasses) on amazon and ended up getting them for around $50.00 cheaper and they were delivered within two to three days. I have gone through several different brands over the years. Oakley and Von Zipper mostly. These are more comfortable and honestly a lot more fashionable than any pair I have ever owned. I definitely recommend these if you like this style.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: They're stylish and comfortable. Still going strong after 2 years of use
customer_reviews.text: These are the most expensive pair of glasses I have ever purchased (aside from some Oakleys purchased for wear in Iraq and Afghanistan). I don't regret my purchase one bit. They're stylish and comfortable. Still going strong after 2 years of use. If money is not as important to you as a well made, stylish and functional sunglass, then these are the glasses for you.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Bronson

customer_reviews.title: Retro, classic Ray-Ban's
customer_reviews.text: Dark lenses, smaller lenses and frame suitable for a woman's face. Lenses are good quality but not polarized. I needed to have the frames tightened up a bit after I received them to adjust the fit slightly.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these and love them on other people, but the fit (with the clips) really didn't suit my face, with my higher nasal bridge. Also, while the quality was what you'd expect from Ray-Ban--excellent--the gold parts of the glasses are very bright and bling-y and came across as cheap to me. I ordered 49 mm and 51 mm and preferred fit of the 51 mm--I'm an average size woman, with an oval face.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna H Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Really cool looking frames. I got the smaller size 49 and they really fit my face well. Great purchase and amazon is way more affordable than sunglasses hut or the Rayban website. HEADS UP: All the clubmasters are made in China. When Luxottica purchased Rayban, they brought all the machines and manfacturing to italy and made glasses there to rebuild the brand. It worked. They shipped some manufacturing back to China for certain frames after that. Same great quality, same great glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: A little small but good
customer_reviews.text: Classic glasses. They seem smaller than usual but I think it’s my fault cause I bought the smaller ones. There’s a size up and if you prefer bigger glasses I’d recommend doing that.
customer_reviews.author: Jessiekate28

customer_reviews.title: and did not feel comfortable on. I am 6'1 and do have a ...
customer_reviews.text: They did not fit my face at all! Large gaps on either side of the lenses/frame and your eye, and did not feel comfortable on. I am 6'1 and do have a large head, and these still felt awkward. I imagine they fit other peoples faces perfectly, and the fit/finish is what you would expect from RayBan...but these just weren't meant to be for me.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy Boi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sunglasses Complete with Leather Ray- Ban Case
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely the real deal- in description it states that some glasses were made in China while others were made in Italy- this does not affect the quality. Beautiful sunglasses, complete with classic leather Ray-Ban case & microfiber towel inside (though, I was a little surprised that it did not include a repair kit with small screwdriver & replacement screws). The single issue I had with item was a small scratch on one side of frames- I only mention this as I was slightly disappointed to find a flaw (hence the 4 stars rather than 5)-Otherwise it was minute enough that I will not be returning. Shipping was speedy with Amazon prime. Very happy with my purchase- would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Retro-cool and comfortale too!
customer_reviews.text: These Sunglasses are really well made. Real Crystal lenses are not too heavy. The frames fit nicely, are comfortable to wear, and look COOL! They do a great job protecting my eyes, too. My only criticism is that I would have preferred Polarized lenses, and maybe anti-glare coating as an option. But all-in all, I love these glasses and they are made so well, I will have them for a very long time!
customer_reviews.author: G. E. Glaum

customer_reviews.title: "mock tortoise" is just black
customer_reviews.text: I wanted actual tortoise (the marbled brown) look with green lenses, but received them and they're black frames. Not sure why they're even called tortoise. They're lovely sunglasses, and it's a really well built, sturdy frame, but I didn't want black. They're going back.
customer_reviews.author: Jannae

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing quality craftsmanship and materials! Fit amazing and look amazing! Comes in a soft, supple black leather case with a polishing cloth. Only complaint is that there aren't more colors! I have the 49mm and I would recommend it over the 51mm for sure! I have a large head and they look great - I feel like the large lens clubmasters don't look right.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Ma

customer_reviews.title: Love the way they looked but had to return them because they look too small for my face
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 49mm and they didn't look right on my face. I have a narrow face so I thought the smaller of the two available sizes would be the better choice, but I was wrong. I will more than likely re-order them in the 51mm size if they go on sale for the same price as the 49mm. They really are beautiful sunglasses so I hope the 51mm size looks better on me.
customer_reviews.author: drummer4ever

customer_reviews.title: Very uniqe and slightly bold style with the gold frame.
customer_reviews.text: The green lens is good for a sunny day or slightly cloudy day. The arms are able to be adjusted but it is a little tricky to do so. After adjustment of the arms and the nose piece they are quite comfortable. They take a little getting used to but overall a good pair of sunglasses to chill with. They are not the best for activities but relaxing and driving they are fine.
customer_reviews.author: DCoy

customer_reviews.title: Classic Shades
customer_reviews.text: Classically styled and though these obviously don't wrap around to provide optimum eye protection, they clearly are not designed to do so -- but whether you're facing the sun directly or not, wearing these are both protective to the eyes and undeniably styling! A classic, timeless look with impressive (but not onerous) weight and quality craftsmanship, albeit in China.
customer_reviews.author: LDC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sunglasses, stylish and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted a pair of Clubmaster glasses for years, but couldn't justify the cost. Well, I got a gift certificate for my birthday and decided to blow it on these. Worth every penny. These glasses sport excellent lenses, beautiful construction and timeless styling. In fact, I'm not nearly stylish enough to wear them (I'm a slob) but I love them anyway. Go ahead, treat yourself. Even a slob like me looks cool in a pair of Clubmasters.
customer_reviews.author: 718tech

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and fit great
customer_reviews.text: Have had these for years now and I still wear them. Good quality and fit great. Got them for a great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Williams

customer_reviews.title: Classic, Sexy, Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that this was the best that i have ever gotten for Ray Ban sunglasses. Lenses are perfect and original as described. Yes they are made in china but all my ray bans are made in china and i have bought them in the store. Update 21/08/15 I noticed that the Ray Ban letters on right lense was peeled off, I think that if it's original that won't happen. I contacted the seller and they partially refunded my money that let me buy another pair of lenses
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Buy these 😎
customer_reviews.text: Not generic!! Had them made into prescription lenses they were $179 for the same pair at visionworks
customer_reviews.author: Fan

customer_reviews.title: Ray Ban Clubmaster
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a "Neat pair" of glasses. But I have to have prescription lenses put in the frames. I choose Ray Ban Clubmaster frames the Dr. put the frames in a lazer to trace the frames for the lenses. They made the lenses and tinted the glass and put them in the frames. The glasses look great in sun or inside at work, I get alot of complimets from everybody that see them.
customer_reviews.author: Wrecks

customer_reviews.title: The build quality is good and can tell a night and day difference to ...
customer_reviews.text: Any other retailer (ie Sunglasses Hut, Bloomingdales, etc..) have these pair of sunglasses for $150, I decided to buy online to save myself some big bucks. The build quality is good and can tell a night and day difference to fake knock offs and do definitely feel premium.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: My "used" Ray-bans are flawless and affordable!
customer_reviews.text: I won't buy another pair of raybans without checking the amazon warehouse. The glasses are flawless and almost half price!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Clark

customer_reviews.title: Classics are always in.Loving my new shades .
customer_reviews.text: Love them classical look never goes out of style very happy looking foward to purchasing black pairs too.
customer_reviews.author: LovingLife

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: So far I give these a 5! Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Baum

customer_reviews.title: Invest in good shades.
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses offer class and a unique appearance. I have a bigger head. As I was reading many of the reviews before reading, I kept reading that they are no good for a big head and just don't fit properly. They are wide enough such that they do not appear small. They are great! These have the heft to them that they sit on your face, but not too much heft that you always feel like they are there. The price tag is worth it. Buy them. Keep them. Use them. Rather than spending 10 bucks every year on a new pair of shades.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Young

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat Ray Ban for quality and style.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, delivered as described and a solid pair pair of glasses.
customer_reviews.author: FriscoSooner

customer_reviews.title: Very "wow". Lots of options to suit all.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered from Amazon US in the UK. Even with postage and customs charges I still paid around £45 less than the high street price at the moment. Lovely, sturdy feeling glasses very comfortable. I like the way they have different sizes available. I have a slightly smaller than average female head and they fit perfect - I went for the 49mm. Lots of "wow" "really like your sunglasses" comments. Only annoying thing for me is they don't sit on top of your head as comfortably as some when not being worn. If you weren't over cautious they could all off. All in all classic style that's really come back in fashion and won't disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Gemma

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction
customer_reviews.text: There is a difference between these and the $10 - $20 versions. Metal parts have a highly detailed finish with no lumpy spots. The weight is correct so they do not feel like the are going to fly of your head in a wind. The hinges are tight. And finally the proportions of the lenses are "just so".
customer_reviews.author: ideabuzz

customer_reviews.title: Sexy
customer_reviews.text: Girls say I look sexy, guys say I’m hot. I’ve been getting laid 24/7 since I got a pair of these! Thanks Ray Ban!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Ray Ban still doing it right.
customer_reviews.text: Anyone interested in the history of Ray Ban should know they were sold by Bausch and Lomb in the late 90's to Luxottica. All of the products I have seen recently have been made in China. I have compared an American made pair of Wayfarers to the China Wayfarers and the quality seems to be very close. Enough of that. The Clubmaster is still a high quality product. If you like the style they are an excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: James Rex

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Read some reviews regarding made in China v made in Italy. Quite frankly it does not matter for this pair of Ray Bans!! This quality is exceptional as always for Ray Ban!! Very happy with the value too!!!
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Teens to Grandparents love these shades
customer_reviews.text: My 16 year old son loves these glasses (and my 73 year old father liked them so much he bought a pair!)
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy frames, good quality lens
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy frames, good quality lens. The retro look is perfect for a daily look that's cool, and casual. The package comes equipped with a beautiful case that's small and can easily slide into a bag. I like the petite look of the smaller frames.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ngan

customer_reviews.title: Yes, these are Made In China. No, that doesn't make them knockoffs!
customer_reviews.text: I've read some complain that these are cheap and made in China...Well, after stopping into a few sunglass shops after purchasing these, I can say that they are THE exact same that Ray Ban is putting out elsewhere. Yes, the Wayfarers are still labeled as "Made in Italy", but it seems they've moved all Clubmaster production to China. This price couldn't be beat and I couldn't be happier. Just make sure to order the 49mm, unless you have a big face or can pull off the oversized sunglasses look (I sure can't).
customer_reviews.author: mikeymumbles

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product, Speedy Shipping
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore these shades. Ray-Ban produced the most quality eyewear in my personal opinon. The Prime shipping was extremly prompt and i was able to have may shades in record time. Also everything comes authentic just like if if were purchased from Sunglass Hut or any other department store
customer_reviews.author: buddz

customer_reviews.title: Now I Can Tell Who The Alien Invaders Are!!
customer_reviews.text: It also protects my eyes from the the fire chariot in the sky as well as (deep breath) monkey feces, potato guns, the Three Stooges, mace, that rich old lady's fingernails, Kirk Cameron testimonials, samurai swords, voodoo powder(s), eye contact with people, Nicolas Sparks movies, Tim Allen, and airborne cocaine.
customer_reviews.author: Butters

customer_reviews.title: i love my ray-bans, should have bought them sooner!
customer_reviews.text: it's the first time i ever purchased ray-ban sunglasses, and i am happy i did. they fit well, the quality is excellent, and they make me look like a movie star.
customer_reviews.author: joseph f.

customer_reviews.title: I have always worn them and don't intend to change.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome classic style that continues to be trendy. I have worn RayBan Clubmasters for over 30 years and refuse to wear anything else my nephews and nieces always comment on how cool they look and how I never change that part of my look.
customer_reviews.author: J&B Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Ray Ban never disappoints
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my GF and she absolutely loves them. Feel very durable ,light and comfortable. Ray Ban never disappoints.
customer_reviews.author: Corey J. Anstead

customer_reviews.title: It's ray-ban after all
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent! It's summer! So I've been shopping for different sunglasses for new looks, started off with cheap ones you get from clothes shops, and well because they're cheap you really can't complain them being of bad quality. And after a while you get sick of them because they keep falling off, slipping down your face and all. So I might as well get a proper pair, a pair that opticians would happily fix for you if something is wrong, but highly doubt so because it comes with a decent case, the arms are nicely attached not too tight not too loose. I just can't see anyone having an opinion on them.
customer_reviews.author: Ash Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses, but I got a different cover as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are of good quality but I received a black case however the picture shows a tan colored. When I contacted the seller, I was told Amazon has keeps the inventory and I need to contact them. After 2 attempts of calling, I accepted the fate, and started wearing the glasses. Great product, but 2 less stars for Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Dreamer

customer_reviews.title: Careful, first set came broken
customer_reviews.text: The first pair I ordered came with the top screw holding the frames together missing. This was quickly remedied by Amazon and now I couldn't like them more. Slightely smaller than you might imagine from the picture, they frame your face classically.
customer_reviews.author: PN

customer_reviews.title: Classic look, superior quality, great price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these from the US (sending to here UK) because they are so expensive here, they were delivered very quickly, a few days short of the estimated time, good tracking was provided too. They were extremely well packaged meaning there was almost no chance of them being damaged in transport. The glasses themselves feel really good quality, and look awesome, it's definitely worth the extra money you would spend over river island, topman asos etc.as far as longevity, I bought these for a freind so he would have to comment on that however with the rayban warranty I'm sure they'll be great
customer_reviews.author: Andy Paterson

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I received these classic shades in a couple of days with Prime and they are perfect. The smaller size fits great and the craftmanship far exceeds any knock-offs I've ever considered. Once you splurge on the real thing, you will never look back!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M. Clements

customer_reviews.title: excellent !!
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted to buy this sun glasses for a log time, they're " the real deal" don't be fooled by the Made In China Sticker..they are well-made under Ray Ban supervision and approval. Worth the wait and the price was nice too. Highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Fear but all for naught
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous after reading a few reviews that said that they had a loose lens. My product came quicker than expected and is in fantastic condition. I also was slightly hesitant fearing that it would be a knock off for the price but they are the real deal. I am super pleased--now if only winter would end and I could wear them more than a few times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: ... they block out the sun UV and they look good on my face
customer_reviews.text: Wish the frame was slightly larger but they block out the sun UV and they look good on my face.
customer_reviews.author: dj sbc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Came in two days, perfect condition, genuine product. These are my favorite sunglasses by far. Very clear to see out of and they don't block too much sun to where it looks cloudy through them on a rainy day. Love these
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé wanted a nice pair of sunnies after dealing with cheap pairs in the past. Gave as a birthday gift and she loved them. Shipping was super fast and packaging was top notch. Would definitely buy from again!
customer_reviews.author: Conrad LY

customer_reviews.title: ... them for over a year now and still look great. You should be aware that these are not ...
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing them for over a year now and still look great. You should be aware that these are not the raybans made in Italy but are instead made in china. The quality suffered a little but it's nearly indistinguishable.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher John Alderman

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my daughter, she loves them. I would make sure you’re ordering the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Classic Ray-Bans
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife as a replacement for her old pair. She loves these Ray-Bans and we saved money buying them on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: JMoses

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best sunglasses I have ever owned. They are well worth the price and will last me a very long time. They fit comfortably and I love the style. I've never had any issues with them at all.
customer_reviews.author: CorinneSkii999

customer_reviews.title: Instant Classic
customer_reviews.text: I have gotten more compliments on these bad boys that any other pair of sunglasses I have ever owned. They fit great and I have a tiny face. Comfortable and affordable. Love these Classic Clubmasters
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Not so sure....
customer_reviews.text: Well...they look like the real thing, but they are MADE IN CHINA! How can I tell if it's a good copy or the real thing? Btw, I paid the price of the originals. Which were made in italy, that s known for its high quality optical industry.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Garbarino

customer_reviews.title: though the design is very nice, I'm still using my Serengeti sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: It's a little big for my nose and heavy, it tends to fall down, though the design is very nice, I'm still using my Serengeti sunglasses, they are wonderful and lighter. I have them since 10 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Myriam M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son this summer. These were sold out everywhere, and the item we got was exactly the same as the Ray-Bans at the stores. Not sure why more people don't buy them online, but we are very satisfied customers.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Selective

customer_reviews.title: Great fit. Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Perfect size. Look great. Great alternative to the wayfarer. This model is not polarized but I don't think you need it unless you plan on fishing wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: jtsano

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately they are too small for my face but fit my daughter great. They were sent promptly and well packaged
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are very well made and as described. Unfortunately they are too small for my face but fit my daughter great. They were sent promptly and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: DaisyGrl

customer_reviews.title: Nice pair of shades
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what me daughter was looking for and I was able to save a little money and get them for her on Amazon, lightning fast shipping and product well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff T

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses look very unique and fit well. If you are looking for a nice pair of sunglasses to wear walking around the city or most any other outdoor activity then look no further. These sunglasses however are not meant for activities with high amounts of movement where they may be dropped or fall off. The style used is very nice and I have received quite a few compliments on them. The only con I would mention is that the lenses are not polarized but this is nothing deal-breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Perey Rousseas

customer_reviews.title: 🚅🚅🚅🚅
customer_reviews.text: Nice sunglasses. Fit a little weird but that's probably because I have a big nose.
customer_reviews.author: Patti S.

customer_reviews.title: classic
customer_reviews.text: Love these sunglasses. They are a classic look that will never go out of style. They fit perfectly. Delivery was actually earlier than expected. I would recommend these with no hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy and 100% satisfied!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first pair if very good sunglasses and I a thrilled that I made the choice! My clubmasters arrived quickly and just as described. If anyone is skeptical that these are real please put your mind at ease, I checked them out through videos on YouTube and also by sunglasses hut, their the real deal! Thank you Amazon I love my ray bans!!
customer_reviews.author: Yankeesfan50

customer_reviews.title: Real deal
customer_reviews.text: Made in china, Doesnt mean they arent the real deal. Luxotica confirmed opening factorues in china, and since Ray Bans fall under Luxotica theyre obviously made there too for cheaper labour or whatever and hence engraved made in china. If youre feeling too paranoid, check its serial code... It will confirm its authenticity
customer_reviews.author: Rushil Gumasana

customer_reviews.title: not the most comfortable. feel a little fragile
customer_reviews.text: not the most comfortable. feel a little fragile, the whole assembly of the glasses is put together with all those tiny screws. high maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: shop savey

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses
customer_reviews.text: Great price and fast shipping. My son loves them. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Heather Fowble

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses have been around for years and the style never gets old. My wife wears these and looks great in them. Of course Ray-Ban quality is second to none.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory B. Chiartas

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! I'd already tried them on before so there wasn't much doubt. It came neatly packaged and it is a beautiful design. They are just like my grandfather's glasses!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love these! The perfect size for me not too big not too small. Love them and they are 100% authentic even though it says made in China, I've seen in the retail stores the same ones with the made in China logo so they're authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Marisela Molina

customer_reviews.title: Goddess Kali
customer_reviews.text: Really nice looking glasses. Comfortable fit. Ladies glasses quite smallish (not child smallish though), just what I wanted. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dancer

customer_reviews.title: Fit like a charm
customer_reviews.text: So stylish. Fit like a charm. The mere feel of them in your hands screams quality
customer_reviews.author: DMS

customer_reviews.title: Love these sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Love these sunglasses! They are my go to pair. They have a slight greenish tint which makes everything look super nice especially in spring. I get compliments all the time for them. They have also put up with a lot of abuse from leaving them outside for extended periods, dropping them, and knocking around my full backpack with no damage. I always keep them in the case they came with. My only gripe with the glasses is that they slide down my nose a little bit, so I have to push them back up occasionally. This is usually only when I'm sweaty and in a hurry walking fast though.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: ... these as a gift for my husband who has loved this shape and brand for years
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my husband who has loved this shape and brand for years. This pair is no exception - well made, reasonably priced and comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Leslee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Classic design yet modern take on easily recognizable sunglasses. 2nd pair btw.
customer_reviews.author: Jig

customer_reviews.title: these glasses are perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: What can I say...these glasses are perfect for me! I love the tint and the size. I've never had a pair of Ray-Bans that I didn't like!
customer_reviews.author: happy squirrel

customer_reviews.title: Beware of glasses from this vendor
customer_reviews.text: Terrible glasses. The vendor sent youth glasses. Cannot wear them.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They're perfect. They fit my face well without pinching my nose, they aren't too heavy, and I love them!

customer_reviews.title: rayban style
customer_reviews.text: A classic at a realistic price. These glasses are a high grade green glass lens that is light weight and affordable.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, but childlike size
customer_reviews.text: As per Ray-Ban form, these sun-glasses look very cool, except they seem like they are a children's size. Very small and close together lenses.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I changed these into prescription glasses and they are so unique and exactly what I wanted.

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: Great shape and style. Frames are a little narrow on my husband's face, but not too small. A really good looking pair of glasses -- effortlessly cool.
customer_reviews.author: B.A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Clubmaster sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Love the classic style of these glasses. I've seen them in stores for $150 - $180. When I saw them for $80 on Amazon I just had to order them. Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.author: Franco

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable fit and according to others quite fashionable ! Highly recommend these classy shades. Not sure where these are made.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mankowski

customer_reviews.title: Old School - maybe spent too much time on the boat.
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses, authentic, one of the side pieces has a bend in it. Like maybe it was melted in a crate or something.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love 'em! They're perfect. Great quality and great price. These are my new favorites! I look forward to wearing them!!
customer_reviews.author: Blmtfish

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THEM!!!! Exactly as expected!!! 100% original. I have rated with a 4-star because the cleaning cloth was missing inside the package. I have sent an email to see if they can shipped it to me. The product was exactly as described, really happy with my purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Florencia LLamosas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Quality. These are extremely well made. As one would expect with the brand name. Good name. Nice clear lenses. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Todd

customer_reviews.title: ... I mean is small for my face since I like oversized glasses BUT my boyfriend loves them so he ...
customer_reviews.text: What I mean is small for my face since I like oversized glasses BUT my boyfriend loves them so he took em! Lol everything worked out. LOVE the color of these glasses though. And really good price.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki O.

customer_reviews.title: Classic, Preppy, COOL!
customer_reviews.text: Classic, preppy, cool. I got compliments from the very first day I wore these CLUB MASTER glasses.
customer_reviews.author: K. Martinak

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.text: A true classic - iconic look and very well made. Includes a case and cloth for cleaning the glass. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: GM

product_meta.title: Ray-Ban Rb3016 Clubmaster Square Sunglasses
product_meta.description:
The iconic look, shape, and appearance of the Ray-Ban Clubmaster Classic is both retro and timeless. Inspired by the cultural revolution of the 1950s, Clubmaster glasses have been featured in Hollywood classic movies and worn by cultural intellectuals. Clubmasters also have an unmistakable appearance that is both fashionable and functional. Designed from 100% acetate and including metal enhancements for improved stability, the Ray-Ban Clubmaster is available in a variety of frame colors including black or tortoise frames and an array of lens colors and treatments including polarized, non-polarized, gradient and mirrored. While wearing the Ray-Ban RB3016 Clubmaster Classic design, you’ll always make a statement.

Ray-Ban is the world’s most iconic eyewear brand and is a global leader in its sector. Every model in the Ray-Ban collection is the product of meticulous, original styling that translates the best of the latest fashion trends into an ever-contemporary look for millions of Ray-Ban wearers around the world. From the early Aviator style that emerged in 1937 to the introduction of the classic Wayfarer in 1952, Ray-Ban is a brand that embodies America, adventure, great cities, wide-open spaces, heroism, individuality, and authenticity.
feature_bullets: Classic clubmaster sunglasses: The Ray-Ban Clubmaster has an iconic look, shape, feel, and style. Worn by cultural intellectuals and Hollywood superstars, these superior glasses are both comfortable and fashionable.
100% Uv protection: To protect your eyes from harmful UV rays, these sunglasses include lenses that are coated with 100% Uv protection.
Durable acetate frames: Our professional Ray-Ban glasses feature lightweight yet Durable acetate frames. The shape and curvature may need adjustment for precision fit.

Multiple frame and lens colors: Choose from multiple colors of frames—including black and tortoise—and lenses—including non-polarized and polarized, mirrored and gradient options. Made from high-quality glass, Ray-Ban lenses are prescription ready.
Multiple size options: Choose from a variety of size options including 49mm & 51mm.
Case & lens cloth included: Each pair of Ray-Ban sunglasses come with a case and lens cloth to clean and protect them from scratches and damage.
Visit the ray-ban brand shop: Click on the Ray-Ban logo above to view the entire Ray-Ban brand assortment. Temple Length: 140
